space.$description: Padding applied on top nav extension wrapper (small size).

x.$description: Left & right top nav extension padding (top nav extension small size).

y.$description: Top & Bottom top nav extension padding (top nav extension small size).

radius.$description: Top Nav extension radius. (extension small size)

sm.$description: Used as horizontal padding for left, center, right inner containers.

md.$description: Vertical gap between elements (applied on slot component).
